channel.title: advanced on Share and connect.
channel.description: Recent content in advanced on Share and connect.

item.title: It's Exclusive at the Top
item.description: What is Kaggle? One of the top communities for data science is the online-community of kaggle.com. There are tutorials, discussions, datasets and online competitions on this website. Beyond that, kaggle is one of the most important tools of the open source data science community. Not only through the sharing of code and datasets, but mostly by crowdsourcing data science projects through competitions. Even top notch tech companies have leveraged the power of these competitions and reward participants with high prizes (at the time of writing, the highest being $100,000 offered by Jane Street Group).

item.title: Life Expectancy - Time Series Clustering
item.description: Image by Alexas_Fotos from Pixabay Life Expectancy in different countries In this article, we want to take a look at time-series clustering. Great time-series data can be acquired with the WorldBank-API. For starters, we will query the life-expectancy for men and women from all available countries. In a next step, we calculate the average life-expectancy as: \[LE_{avg} = \frac{LE_{men} + LE_{women}}{2} \]. Note that this does not take different populations of men and women into account, they are weighted equally.
